dct_title_s: New map of Boston comprising the whole city with the new boundaries of the wards : Engraved expressly for the Boston almanac for 1853
dct_description_sm: Engraved by: G.W. Boynton.; Street plan of city with wards identified by number.; Table of references identifies prominent buildings.; Second inset reproduces the eighteenth-century Bonner plan as a comparison to the city of 1853.
Scale indeterminate. Scale of Bonner inset approximately 1:17,000
